review:
Doctor was able to listen to the problem and recommended follow up with ENT and then visit again .

Consultation provided and follow up scheduled

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been in touch with The Dental Specialist since 2013. The Chief of the organization Dr. P. Venkat Ratna Nag, MDS has a very good and expreience hand in dental implantation as as well as Prosthodentist & Cosmetic dentistry. I loved his attitude, behaviour and professionalism on my first visit. He have successfully carried out the implants procedure for my wife. This is my forth visit to this mighty organization to avail different procedure for treating my wife. The entire medico as well as non medico staff are very polite, friendly and cooperative while dealing with their patients. The Dental Specialist has growing rapidly with modern equipments and technology which has proven effect even on even treating very critical procedures. The entire clinic is maintaining total hygine and cleanliness and the environment is very shooting for patients. The pedodontics dentistry is maintained by Dr. P. Sarika MDS who is very friendly and passionate while handling kid patients. I can't wind up my review without thanking Dr. P. Ruthika MDS for all her support and devotion toward carrying out the Prosthodontics procedure on my wife. I wholeheartedly thank all the Doctors and Staff for every services they have rendered to us so generously. May God bless the organization to render more support and treatment with their with their most competitive charges with best of the facilities. I must thank Mr Vinod the driver of the organization for carrying us around to lab and clinic in every emergency move. I presume to be the best dental clinic in Hyderabad, India. Congratuations!!! The Dental Specialist and especially Dr. P. Venkat Ratna Nag for leading such a mighty organization with such disciplin. Thanks in anticipation.

Rajiv Hazarika
Assam, India
**********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to meet Dr Divya Singh and Dr P Sarika for front teeth cavity in my 2yr 8mth old daughter. They both are very affectionate and very child friendly. Although  my daughter is a bit cranky towards doctors, they both did the primary investigations pretty well and with care. The cavities in the top front four teeths were very deeps and had reached the pulp. They suggested to go for pulp therapy under general anesthesia, as my daughter is very small and is very afraid of the dental instruments. I went ahead with their suggestion, and had the treatment done  in the Nice Hospitals at Masab Tank. The complete procedure went pretty well, and my daughter is liking her new teeth now. *** ******* *** ****** ************* *** cleared all the doubts that I had about the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been taking treatment for our 10 year old daughter for the last several months in this wonderful clinic. Our first impression when we stepped into the clinic was that it was clean, neat and organized. The doctors here are highly skilled, proffesional and world class. Staff are well trained, courteous and helpful. Prices are nominal and all charges are explained in a transparent fashion. As such the doctors have a noncommercial mindset with the prime focus on the well being of the patient and on providing quality service. On the whole, we are fortunate to have found  this clinic and are highly satisfied with everything (treatment, price, quality etc.). To be specific, our daughter's treatment is progressing well and the results obtained so far is astonishing under the able and skillful guidance of Dr. Sarika. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone who is looking for dental service.

tags: None
review:
I came to know about Dr. Sarika through practo. I read good reviews about her and decided to consult her as my child was suffering with severe tooth decay and pain. He wasnt able to chew hard food items as he complained of pain whenever he ate. The way she handled my kid and treated him is very appreciative. He underwent rootcanal which was a success. Dr. Sarika suggested general anesthesia during the procedure as he is very young. He now has no pain and is able to eat hard items like before. And his smile makes me smile even more.

I will always be grateful to her.

tags: None
review: My son is 20 months old and he had infected teeth. He was suffering from pain and hence got him here to Dr. Sarika. She did the root canal treatment for my son and now he has no pain.  He is absolutely fine. No more symptoms . she is an awesome kids dentist  who understands how they feel and treated him eoith lots of care and love. I recommend Dr. Sarika for any kids dental health problems. My son loves to be here in the clinic as the ambience is also perfectly entertaining. He loves to play with the dolls, watch cartoons here on a huge screen and roam around as it is clean even I'll not stop him. Thanks to Sarika mam.

tags: None
review: My daughter eats lots of sweets and chocolates and has got her tooth decayed. The cavity was so deep that it was giving lot of pain to my daughter. I have read about Dr. Sarika on net and have approached her. She checked the oral condition of my daughter completely and told us that pulpectomy has to be done. She patiently explained us the steps in it and then started with the treatment. She was very kind patient child friendly. My daughter didn't have any pain during the entire treatment. Frankly speaking I should say Dr. Sarika is one of the best pedodontist in fact the best pedodontist I can say. She knows very well how to handle kids. Thank you so much Dr. Sarika. I would recommend Dr. Sarika to everyone without a second thought.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Actually we took the consultation from Dr P Venkat who is very friendly and explained the  problem with great patience and also requested Gum Specialist to do further checkup.very satisfied with the consultation. Great thing to note is Consultation will be taken only once per persoon for the life time... this is amazing.. many hospitals charge consultation for every week or 10 days...We have booked for the Gum treatment .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Sarika handled my 5 yr old son exceedingly well, and filled his cavity! My son after the treatment said " that didn't pain at all and aunty is really nice, she gave me stickers too" üòÅ
Dr Sarika surely does have a knack to treat little kids

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my 10 year old daughter to Dr.Sarika for a dental checkup. She was extremely friendly and made my daughter very comfortable. She was gentle during the procedure and has lot of patience. She did the required treatment and gave valuable tips for oral hygiene. We strongly recommend her and the clinic for dental problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am from Khammam District and on my colleague's suggestion I had visited 'The Dental Specialists' (Banjara Hills) to undergo treatment for dental cyst. Initially Dr. Ayesha investigated and elaborated the underlying issue to me through digital X-rays and specified number of sittings needed for the treatment. Later,Dr. Chaitrika did RCT (laser) followed by crown placing by Dr.Apoorva. Both the Doctors are very professional & did thier job meticulously and answered all my queires patiently. During entire treatment, I have not taken single medicine/pain-killer which obviously signifies how flawless the treatment was. Moreover,the Hospital ambience is so pleasant to wait till my turn comes and the front desk staff are very cordial. The most appreciable thing is that they have fixed appointments (of four sittings) as per my schedule (as I need to come from Khammam for every sitting). Greetings to Dr. Sarika who is managing and maintaining the Clinic exceptionally well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ****** ********* ********** *** ****** **** . Dr Sarika and her team were kids friendly and made the treatment a positive experience for my 6 years old daughter . They worked on her pace and were very professional at the work done ! Thank you üíê

It was good to see the team have also hired staff with disability üëçüèº

I also recommend Dr Ruheena Khan and the orthodontic team only all were very professional , flexible with appointments but also kept me well informed about the treatment plan . They also reasonably priced ! I highly recommend them and will surely visit again 
 üôÇ

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a great experience at The Dental Specialist. Dr. Sarika and Dr. Lalitya were our doctors. We visited the centre for my 5 year old son. The doctors were extremely warm and their approach of bonding with the kid made the procedures easy and seamless. In 2 visits my son wanted to visit the clinic rather than fearing the treatment. Special thanks to Dr.Sarika and Dr Lalitya for their patience and efforts.The most impressive thing about this place is the experience and service that we got. Never had to follow up for appointments. Waiting time is neglible. Staff is hospitable and prompt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** ** *** ** *** **** ****** **** ****** *** ****** **** **** ***** I was so scared about dentist from my past experience and they've helped me so much!  They really do care about your feeling and try to make every trip comfortable. I loved how my doctor played music for me to calm my nerves! They are also very patient on explaining to me about how I can improve my gum health better using correct brushing techniques. Thanks to them I no longer bleed whenever I brush my teeth and I feel I can trust them very much. It was absolutely wonderful to go there.
I highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We came here for Dr. Sarika all the way from Jalpaiguri district, Maal bazar, West Bengal. 
My daughter Ipsha Ahmed had only roots left of her front teeth and back teeth were also paining from a long time.
We visited many dentists there in West Bengal but were never satisfied with their treatment. It made no difference to her condition. We checked on Google for the best pedodontists in India and that's how we came across Dr. Sarika and THE DENTAL SPECIALISTS!
They are an amazing dental clinic. The treatment went on for 4 days and it was all treated like a dream! After so many days we saw our daughter laugh and play!
I am very thankful to Dr Sarika for her friendly approach towards my child who she befriended and treated!

I WILL HIGHLY RECOMMEND DR. SARIKA AND THE DENTAL SPECIALISTS HOSPITAL.

Regards,
Imtiaz

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I came to know about The Dental Specialists and Dr. Sarika through a google online search. Initially I was very reluctant as the clinic is very far from where I stay. But I realized quality of treatment is what matters. I am very satisfied with the treatment she offered. She treats kids very politely.
What I absolutely liked about her is that she treated my daughter like her daughter and treated. The constant follow up calls next day ensuring your child's condition is very appreciating.
You never see such commitment that anywhere.
I recommend Dr. Sarika and THE DENTAL SPECIALISTS to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sarika is a full on experience doctor for kids dental issues .. Handles kids with lots of patience n always makes you aware of the exact situation of ur child and educates the parents with Pro's n Con's ...  We had a great experience with Dr. Sarika... My kid had severe decay issues n now my kid is all fine after the treatment with her... Best part is my kid(3.6yrs) started being friendly with the doctor now ..i mean now no fear of doctor or the treatment .. All thanks to Dentist Aunty üòÄ
        I would also like to appreciate her for taking time with each patient and educating them the importance of daily oral care for the well being  .... Thank you ma'am for all the support and assurance u have given to my kid...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I got the information of Dr Sarika from practice.there we saw may positive feedback so we decided to visit her..my son is only 17 months old and had tooth decay problem Dr told us for surgery with anesthesia...we decided to do all process for our child future.we were very sacred because our child is very small but Dr Sarika calm us and did her best.now my child can eat chew and smile very nicely.I refer many other parents also to her because.she is very nice to parents and kids very friendly and soft spoken and one of the experienced pedodontics.any kid with tooth prob can visit her .

Next appointment would be after 3 months. Hospital and specially doctors room is decorated for kids. My daughter really liked it. Recommend, pls visit if your kids is suffering from any dental problem.

We thank doctor for her care band love towards my kids . she is an awesome kids dentist. And I never want to go anywhere else.
